question: This bank surpassed TCS to become the country's second most valued firm on BSE in terms of market valuation.
explanation: HDFC Bank surpassed Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) to become the country's second most valued firm on BSE in terms of market valuation to a 53 per cent jump in the shares of former this year on quarter-after-quarter strong results. HDFC Bank has a pre-eminent presence in the retail banking segment (50 per cent of loan book) and has been able to maintain strong and consistent loan book growth, gradually gaining market share.
